authOr: OR
authEmailMessageValid: Please enter a valid email address.
authInputValidPassword: Use 8 or more characters including both upper and lower case letters and numbers.
projectModelCreateModelSelectBaseModel: Select a base model and add it to your project.
projectModelCredentialsDesc: We will send an inference request to the provider to verify the credentials. All credentials are encrypted at rest using AES-256 and in transit using TLS 1.2. Please refer to the
projectModelPropertiesDesc: Indicates if the model supports function call.
projectModelStreamingDesc: Indicates if the model supports streaming of text chunks.
projectModelInputMaxTokensDesc: The maximum number of tokens that can be included in the model's input.
projectModelOutputMaxTokensDesc: The maximum number of tokens allowed in the output.
projectModelEmbeddingSizeDesc: The maximum number of tokens that the model can generate as output.
projectDeleteModelDesc: This action cannot be undone and all configurations associated with the model will be affected.
projectPlaygroundSelectAssistantInfo: Select or enter a valid assistant ID to start chatting
projectPlaygroundWaitingForResponse: Please wait for the assistant to respond.
projectSendMessageUserFirst: Please send the user message first.
projectPlaygroundGenerationOptionsDesc: Select the type of messages that will be returned to the frontend.
projectSystemPromptTemplateDesc: A system prompt for a chat completion model is the initial instruction that guides its response. This can incorporate a template with variable parameters, and any block without parameters is excluded from the final prompt.
projectSystemPromptTemplateLink: Refer to the documentation for a comprehensive understanding of the usage of the system prompt.
projectMemoryDesc: The context memory is the assistant’s ability to retain and use information from previous interactions during a conversation to maintain continuity and relevance in responses.
projectMemoryLink: Refer to the documentation to see the difference between various memory methods.
projectAssistantRetrievalDesc: Enter the collection ID available in your project.
projectAssistantToolsDesc: Select the actions or tools you need from those available in your project.
projectAssistantSystemPromptRequired: System prompt template cannot exceed 16384 characters
projectAssistantDeleteDesc: This action cannot be undone and all integrations associated with the assistant will be affected.
projectRetrievalCreateDesc: The description serves as an internal description clarifying the purpose of the collection; it is not used as part of the agent prompt.
projectRetrievalCapacityDesc: Capacity refers to the maximum number of chunks the collection can store.
projectRetrievalDeleteDesc: This action cannot be undone and all retrieval integrations associated with the collection will be affected.
projectChunkTextContentDesc: The text content of the chunk. Once created, it is converted into a computation-manageable vector via the collection's embedding model.
projectDeleteChunkDesc: This action cannot be undone and all chunks associated with the reocrd will be deleted.
projectRecordContentDesc: The content of the record. Upon creation, it will be segmented into smaller chunks and converted into computationally manageable vectors, following the rules set in the collection configuration. Currently only content in raw text format is supported.
projectRecordTitleDesc: The title of the record. It will be appended to the top of each chunk derived from the record to improve semantic relevance.
projectRecordChunkSizeDesc: The collection's records will be segmented into separate chunks to optimize data retrieval. Each chunk's capacity, known as the chunk size, ranges from 100 to 500 tokens.
projectRecordChunkOverlapDesc: Chunk overlap specifies how much overlap there should be between chunks, counted by number of tokens.
projectActionSchemaCompliant: The action JSON schema is compliant with
projectActionSchemaDesc: . If there are multiple paths and methods in the schema, the service will create multiple actions whose schema only has exactly one path and one method. We’ll use 'operationId' and 'description' fields of each endpoint method as the name and description of the tool. Check
projectActionEditDesc: The action schema, Which is compliant with the OpenAPI Specification. It should only have exactly one path and one method.
projectActionAuthenticationType: Choose an authentication type for the action, and provide necessary credentials. All credentials are encrypted at rest with AES-256 and in transit with TLS 1.2.
projectActionDeleteDesc: This action cannot be undone and all integrations associated with the action will be affected.
projectDeleteDesc: Please be aware that once the API Key is deleted,it will no longer have the access to your project.
projectEditProjectDesc: Briefly describe the role of the project
projectDeleteProjectDesc: This action cannot be undone and all data related to the project will be deleted.
projectSelectProvider: Select a provider who hosts the models
projectBundleDesc: Select a bundle that fits your requirement
projectPluginDeleteDesc: Are you sure you want to unregister
deleteItem: Are you sure you want to delete
deleteProjectDesc: Delete the project and all its data. This action cannot be undone.
spaceAllProjectDesc: Welcome to the TaskingAI Project Dashboard. Project is a specialized workspace to develop and manage LLM-driven application efficiently. Each project serves as a dedicated platform for your AI initiatives, encompassing everything from AI assistant development to API integration and service management. Embrace the full potential of TaskingAI in your professional journey.
spaceDeleteOrganizationDesc: Delete the organization and all its data.This action cannot be undone.
spaceDeleteOrganizationDescEnd: and all its data? A identity verification is needed before further action.
spaceOrganizationCreateDesc: Each user can at most join 2 free-plan organizations
spaceLogoutDesc: Are you sure you want to log out of your TaskingAI account?
spaceSubscriptionDesc: Choose the plan that best suits you.
spaceSubscriptionStarterDesc: Perfect for passion projects & simple websites.
spaceSubscriptionProDesc: For production AI applications with the option to scale.
spaceSubscriptionProEverything: Everything in the Free plan, plus
